title: 2.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a new repository for the Calculator app from the challenges in the previous sprints. Initialize it with a README file. Set up a basic project board with the To Do, In Progress, and Done columns. Create a list of tasks related to the project and assign them to the team members.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
